attributes.action: encourage British parliament to make the ownership of Rolls-Royce motor cars compulsory in law and to make purchasing easier by introducing a means tested tax credit specifically for this purpose.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a campaign to encourage the British government to make the ownership of Rolls-Royce motor cars compulsory in law and to make purchasing easier by introducing a means tested tax credit specifically for this purpose.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
